description:
Penny and Billy work together to find the hidden location of Element X and launch a last-ditch effort to destroy the alien planet’s navigation system.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auftritt der Superwaffe: Die letzte Schlacht der Erde!
Chouheiki Shutsugeki! Chikyuu Saigo no Tatakai!
Enter the Super Weapon! The Last Battle for Earth!
Встречайте супероружие. Последний бой за Землю
超兵器出撃! 地球最期の戦い!
